column1: Funeral services will be held on Wednesday
column3: 2015 at 11:00 a.m. at Leikness Funeral Home in Wautoma with Rev. Dale W. Bahls officiating. Burial will be in Wautoma Union Cemetery. Visitation will be held on Wednesday from 10:00 a.m. until the time of services. A Memorial is being established for Grace Lutheran Church
